title: Proposal: Add a shiny/unique background for Haunt 1 Aavegotchis
body: With so many people asking for a Haunt 2, we would potentially see 25k extra portals(according to medium article of unique addresses during launch) added if we let each person buy just 1 portal and this will be catastrophic to the current market of Haunt 1 Aavegotchis. People who bought from baazaar at multiples of the launch price will suffer from huge loses too if this were to happen. Therefore I suggest to add something unique like a shiny background for Haunt 1 in order to maintain the “limited” component of the initial launch. This will make everyone happy because Haunt 1 buyers will not suffer loses or devaluation of their purchase while more people get to enjoy the game and mass adoption can come true in the future.
author: 0x94a5b840F6898E5178649A2b117B3cE3BB7aA873
